verses.roman:
viṁśati vatsara aiche kailā gatāgati
anyonye duṅhāra duṅhā vinā nāhi sthiti

synonyms: viṁśati—twenty; vatsara—years; aiche—thus; kailā—did; gata-āgati—going and coming; anyonye—mutually; duṅhāra—of Lord Caitanya and the devotees; duṅhā—the two; vinā—without; nāhi—there is not; sthiti—peace.
translation: For twenty consecutive years this meeting took place, and the situation became so intense that the Lord and the devotees could not be happy without meeting one another.
